SEARCH
Module new_project
Package db

Class OrderListController

java.lang.Object
db.OrderListController
All Implemented Interfaces:
DBController
public class OrderListController extends Object implements DBController
Manages the database operations related to customer orders. This class interacts with the OrderList class to create new orders, retrieve orders, get lists of orders (all, unfinished, next), and handle database read/write operations for order data.
